nodes.text: Progress Plaza was a large public plaze in Calimondretta, the main city on the planet Syned which was the icy capital of the Sith state known as the Arkadianate. In 1032 BBY, the Jedi Knight Kerra Holt and the mercenary leader Jarrow Rusher visited Progress Plaza during a tour organized by Sith Lord Arkadia Calimondra, the Arkadianate's ruler. Progress Plaza was presumably damaged during the Siege of Calimondretta.
